title: What's Your Dog Telling You?
description: From the bestselling author of The Dog Man comes the ultimate guide for understanding your dog. Martin 'The Dog Man' McKenna has helped thousands of humans communicate better with their dogs. Now, in this book, he shares the things he's learned - and shows how with simple tricks, anyone can improve dogs' behaviour and solve long-standing problems.What's your Dog Telling You? reveals what your dog is thinking when he jumps up on you when you get home from work (it's not always because he's happy to see you), why he licks you (it's a form of domination), why he sometimes blinks a lot (he's nervous), along with solving many other doggy mysteries. Whatever your dog's age, breed or personality, you'll discover at last why your dog sometimes behaves strangely. Now you'll find what your dog - or any dog you meet - is trying so desperately to tell you!
author: Martin  McKenna
